errors.error_description: Referencing incorrect directory path 'samples/' instead of 'examples/' for Jupyter notebooks
correction_candidates: Update the directory reference to match the correct examples folder
Fix the path to point to the existing examples directory
Correct samples/ to examples/ in the jupyter command

errors.error_description: Adding invalid --output parameter to bigbang collect-mail command that doesn't exist
correction_candidates: Remove the --output data/output.csv parameter from the command
Replace --output with the correct parameter name for specifying output location
Use bigbang collect-mail --url <url> without additional output parameters
Change --output to --destination or another valid parameter
errors.golden_answer: Remove the --output data/output.csv parameter from the command
